title: UPware 4-Piece Ribbed Melamine Ice Cream Bowl
features: Size: 4 3/4 inch dia. x 2 3/4 inch H

Bowl is in the shape of a Ribbed. Our dinnerware bowl set is conveniently stackable to keep your kitchen neat and organized and save space in drawers and cabinets. Each dinnerware bowl set makes an ideal housewarming gift for your friends and relatives. Perfect for home, party, beach, picnic, camping, or vacation.
description: These bowls are perfect for ice cream, sorbet, granola and yogurt, fresh fruit salad or even a good prep bowl for those small homemade concoctions. Use them for picnics, barbecues, parties, and other festive events.
